info.name: Firefox | Australis Mockup Theme
info.description:
Un peque침o scipt para Firefox basado en los mockups Australis creados por Stephen Horlander. Esperemos que esto sea realidad en proximamente en Firefox, mientras tanto cree este script basado en una compilaci칩n no oficial Nightly con el tema Australis.
http://people.mozilla.org/~jwein/australis-backup/firefox-16.0a1.en-US.win32.installer.exe

Para una experiencia Australis con las p치ginas "about:"
http://userstyles.org/styles/44813/
Di치logos nativas de Windows 7
http://userstyles.org/styles/47791/
Funciona correctamente bajo Windows 7/Vista Aero/Basic.
Tema Australis Para Windows 8:
http://userstyles.org/styles/88884/
Tema Australis para Linux Ubuntu/Debian:
http://userstyles.org/styles/74301/
info.additionalInfo: Updates 02/07/2012 identi-box fon-size fixed. 28/06/2012 Tabbrowser Glow Added. 10/08/2012 New Australis Tab (Based on Firefox Nightly) 11/08/2012 Australis Personas support Improved. 15/08/2012 Home Buttton as Tab. 18/08/2012 New Australis Tabs (Based on Thunderbird 15.0). 14/08/2012 Lite problems fixed. Thanks michgagnon. 16/10/2012 Bookmarks-History Sidebar Australis Syle Improved. 27/10/2012 List item improved to Windows 7 Native. 21/12/2012 New Richlistitem. 11/01/2013 New Download Manager Native only for Windows 7. 01/02/2013 Bookmark Toolbar Button style Improved. 05/02/2013 Testing new Australis Buttons. 03/03/2013 Awesome bar on private browsing sprites improved. 07/03/2013 New Notification Bar Theme. 19/03/2013 New Private Browsing Tab (To identify Private Window). 13/04/2013 Old Download Manager style removed. The script is there (http://userstyles.org/styles/44340). 10/05/2013 Little Bugs Fixed on buttons and textbox. 14/06/2013 Little Bugs Fixed 07/07/2013 New Australis Icons (about:home & https:) 15/07/2013 Warnning Icons Bugs Fixed 17/07/2013 New Native Dialog Box 01/08/2013 New Plugins Icons See my other styles http://userstyles.org/users/82707
